tool.name: Merge Flags
tool.description: Merge flags with same index together

param.name: input
param.label: Wide Dataset
param.help: Input dataset in wide format and tab separated. If not tab separated see TIP below.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert* Data sets also must have the same index!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**What it does**
This tool takes in any number of flag files with the same index and merges them together into one easy to read table
**Input**
**Flags File:** A flag file corresponding to flagged values of of the wide and design files::
+----------+---------+---------+---------+-----+ | Compound | sample1 | sample2 | sample3 | ... | +==========+=========+=========+=========+=====+ | one | 0 | 0 | 10 | ... | | two | 5 | 0 | 30 | ... | | three | 0 | 12 | 2 | ... | | four | 32 | 11 | 8 | ... | | ... | ... | ... | ... | ... | +----------+---------+---------+---------+-----+
- Indexes must be the same for the data sets
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Output Files**
- .tsv of merged flag data sets
